bibl.title: The Homer Lexicon of Apollonius Sophista. II. Identity and Transmission.
bibl.note: Continued from: The Homer Lexicon of Apollonius Sophista. I. Composition and Constituents, CP 89 (1994) pp. 1-45. - Seven papyri of the Homer Lexicon of Apollonius have been recognized (list, pp. 107-108). They give a glimpse of the variety of forms that the Lexicon took in response to the shifting needs of its consumers.
HASLAM Michael W., The Homer Lexicon of Apollonius Sophista. II. Identity and Transmission.
